FuncDef:
The remote-backup-profile command creates an RBP and displays the RBP view. If a specified RBP already exists, this command directly displays the RBP view.
The undo remote-backup-profile command deletes a specified RBP.
By default, no RBP is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an RBP.
The value is a string of 1 to 128 case-insensitive characters. The name can only contain digits, letters, underscores (_), hyphens (-), and periods (.). It cannot contain spaces.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
An RBP provides a unified user interface for dual-device backup configurations. To create an RBP and display the RBP view, run the remote-backup-profile command.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the vrrp-id vrid interface interface-type interface-number command to bind the RBP to a specified VRRP backup group.
